snippet.title: Amiga Longplay Lethal Weapon
snippet.description:
http://www.recordedamigagames.org

Played By: Lemm

Lethal Weapon, a super fast action game with nice music and cool clear grafix.
Sometimes our hero, Riggs,  climbs and runs thru the air. It is, because there are hidden bonusses which can only be reached by invisible platforms.
This game is a little bit bugy, Sometimes platforms don't exists or barrels swim out of range (Maybe a winUAE problem? Don't know).  However, when u get the bonus at the end of level sometimes the 5000 Bonus is'nt displayed, but you still get it. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
